languages.text: {n}Капеллан ухмыляется.{/n} "Да что вы, как же так? Единственного наследника огромного состояния хотят убить в месте, где собрались прочие претенденты, обделенные наследством?"
{n}Chaplain grins.{/n} "You don't say! How can this be? Someone wants the sole heir of a tremendous fortune dead, in the place where the other contenders, deprived of these riches, have gathered?"
languages.original_text: {n}Капеллан ухмыляется.{/n} "Да что вы, как же так? Единственного наследника огромного состояния хотят убить в месте, где собрались прочие претенденты, обделенные наследством?"

{n}Chaplain grins.{/n} "You don't say! How can this be? Someone wants the sole heir of a tremendous fortune dead, in the place where the other contenders, deprived of these riches, have gathered?"

{n}Chaplain grins.{/n} "You don't say! How can this be? Someone wants the sole heir of a tremendous fortune dead, in the place where the other contenders, deprived of these riches, have gathered?"
{n}Chaplain grins.{/n} "You don't say! How can this be? Someone wants the sole heir of a tremendous fortune dead, in the place where the other contenders, deprived of these riches, have gathered?"

languages.text: {n}牧师咧嘴笑了。{/n}“当然！那还用说吗？所有被剥夺了继承权的竞争者都聚集在这个地方。你觉得会不会有人打算杀害那个唯一能继承巨额财富的家伙？”
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain grins.{/n} "You don't say! How can this be? Someone wants the sole heir of a tremendous fortune dead, in the place where the other contenders, deprived of these riches, have gathered?"

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师咧嘴笑了。{/n}“当然！那还用说吗？所有被剥夺了继承权的竞争者都聚集在这个地方。你觉得会不会有人打算杀害那个唯一能继承巨额财富的家伙？”

languages.text: {n}Capellán sonríe abiertamente.{/n} «¡No me diga! ¿Cómo es posible? ¿Cree que alguien querría muert{mf|o|a} a{mf|l| la} únic{mf|o|a} hereder{mf|o|a} de una fortuna inmensa en el lugar donde se han reunido todos los pretendientes a ella, sabiendo que no verán ni una triste moneda?».
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain grins.{/n} "You don't say! How can this be? Someone wants the sole heir of a tremendous fortune dead, in the place where the other contenders, deprived of these riches, have gathered?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Capellán sonríe abiertamente.{/n} «¡No me diga! ¿Cómo es posible? ¿Cree que alguien querría muert{mf|o|a} a{mf|l| la} únic{mf|o|a} hereder{mf|o|a} de una fortuna inmensa en el lugar donde se han reunido todos los pretendientes a ella, sabiendo que no verán ni una triste moneda?».

languages.text: {n}教戒官は笑った。{/n}「それはそうでしょう！莫大な財産をたったひとりの相続人に奪われたのだから、びた一文残されなかった者たちの中であなたを殺したがる人がいても当然では？」
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain grins.{/n} "You don't say! How can this be? Someone wants the sole heir of a tremendous fortune dead, in the place where the other contenders, deprived of these riches, have gathered?"

traits.locale_text: {n}教戒官は笑った。{/n}「それはそうでしょう！莫大な財産をたったひとりの相続人に奪われたのだから、びた一文残されなかった者たちの中であなたを殺したがる人がいても当然では？」

languages.text: {n}Ordenspriester grinst.{/n} "Was Ihr nicht sagt! Wie ist das möglich? Jemand will den Tod {mf|des Alleinerben|der Alleinerbin} eines enormen Vermögens, ausgerechnet dort, wo die übrigen Kandidaten, die um ihren Reichtum gebracht wurden, sich versammelt haben?"
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain grins.{/n} "You don't say! How can this be? Someone wants the sole heir of a tremendous fortune dead, in the place where the other contenders, deprived of these riches, have gathered?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ordenspriester grinst.{/n} "Was Ihr nicht sagt! Wie ist das möglich? Jemand will den Tod {mf|des Alleinerbin|der Alleinerbin} eines enormen Vermögens, ausgerechnet dort, wo die übrigen Kandidaten, die um ihren Reichtum gebracht wurden, sich versammelt haben?"

languages.text: {n}Chapelain sourit de toutes ses dents.{/n} « Ça alors ! Quelle surprise ! Qui voudrait bien vouloir tuer l'unique {mf|héritier|héritière} d'une immense fortune à l'endroit même où sont rassemblés tous ceux qui ont été privés de cette même fortune ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain grins.{/n} "You don't say! How can this be? Someone wants the sole heir of a tremendous fortune dead, in the place where the other contenders, deprived of these riches, have gathered?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Chapelain sourit de toutes ses dents.{/n} « Ça alors ! Quelle surprise ! Qui voudrait bien vouloir tuer l'unique {mf|héritier|héritière} d'une immense fortune à l'endroit même où sont rassemblés tous ceux qui ont été privés de cette même fortune ? »

languages.text: {n}Papaz sırıtıyor.{/n} "Yok artık! Nasıl olur? Birisi muazzam bir servetin tek vârisini, bu zenginliklere kedinin ciğere baktığı gibi bakan diğer hak iddiacılarının toplandığı bu yerde öldürmek istiyor demek."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain grins.{/n} "You don't say! How can this be? Someone wants the sole heir of a tremendous fortune dead, in the place where the other contenders, deprived of these riches, have gathered?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz sırıtıyor.{/n} "Yok artık! Nasıl olur? Birisi inanılmaz bir servetin tek vârisini, bu zenginliklere kedinin ciğere baktığı gibi bakan diğer hak sahiplerinin toplandığı bu yerde öldürmek istiyor demek, ha?"
